title: Homeworld Remastered Collection
notes: ERROR: Network unavailable message will occur when creating a LAN lobby. LAN play is not available in the Remastered Collection, both Online and Offline.

title: The Riftbreaker
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Host/Load Game, Create Game Lobby.
Guest: Multiplayer, Join Game, Join With Link, Enter HOST_IP, Connect.

title: Red Faction
notes:
(Setup: Network, T1/LAN)
Host: Multi, Create Game, Start
Guest: Multi, Join Game, Press the LAN Only Button, Lobby Will Appear, Join.

title: Assetto Corsa
notes:
Using protontricks to get the base game set up, a dedicated server would not generate the custom IP by the host.
LAN lobbies function only for dedicated servers.

title: Crypt of the NecroDancer
notes:
(Synchrony DLC)
Host: Multiplayer, Host Online Game, Visibility: IP Address, Server Port: 7777, Host Game.
Guest: Multiplayer, Connect to IP Address, HOST_IP, Server Port: 7777, Connect.

title: Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition
notes: Multiplayer needs online connection to connect to the Beamdog/Bioware servers for server hosting.

title: Barotrauma
notes: Once offline, options for hosting a server become inaccessible in the main menu.

title: Icewind Dale: Enhanced Edition
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Create Game, —, Wait In Lobby.
Guest: Multiplayer, Direct Connect, Input HOST_IP.

title: Baldur's Gate II: Enhanced Edition
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Create Game, —, Wait In Lobby.
Guest: Multiplayer, Direct Connect, Input HOST_IP.

title: Baldur's Gate: Enhanced Edition
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Create Game, —, Wait In Lobby.
Guest: Multiplayer, Direct Connect, Input HOST_IP.

title: Half-Life Arena
notes:
Host: Create Server, Enable Steam Networking, Start.
Guest: Find Server, Hit 'LAN' Tab, Click Host Server, Connect.

title: Total War: ATTILA
notes: Game requires online connection for host to create a lobby. A 'failed to create lobby' prompt will pop up when attempting to.

title: OpenTTD
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Start Server, Visibility: Local, New Game/Load Game.
Guest: Multiplayer, Click "Search LAN", Highlight host server, click join game.

title: SiN Gold
notes:
Host: Game, Multiplayer, Start Multiplayer Game, Internet Game: no, Launch the server.
Guest: Game, Multiplayer, Join Multiplayer Game, Select Enter on Host Lobby.

title: Call of Duty: World at War
notes:
Playable (Dedicated Server): View Muon Verified Discussion Pages to get set up:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/muonverified/discussions/0/688615792191837784/

title: Half-Life: Cross Product Multiplayer
notes:
Host: custom game, ensure "Local Server" is checked, Start Game.
Guest: find games, select "Lan" tab, highlight lobby, Connect.
Both: Press the "X" button to spawn in.

title: Embr
notes: After completing the tutorial in single player offline to unlock multiplayer, the multiplayer menu will prompt with failed to connect to online server messages.

title: Necesse
notes:
Host: Play Multiplayer, Host World, Ensure "Allow connection by IP" is checked, Host.
Guest: Play Multiplayer, Join a server, Host Server will appear on LAN search, Join Server.

title: Base Defense
notes:
Host: Create Game, Create
Guest: Find Games, Select "Lan" Tab, Connect.

title: Your Only Move Is HUSTLE
notes:
Host: Direct Connect, Select Name, Type in Host IP in IP Bar (Leave Port as Default), Host
Guest: Direct Connect, Select Name, Type in Host IP in IP Bar, Join.

title: Bytebond
notes:
Host: Network Co-Op, LAN, Host
Guest: Network Co-Op, LAN, Join, Input Host IP, Enter

title: MISERY
notes:
Guest can not find the host lobby in LAN mode using the default or custom server code created by the host.
LAN matches are tied to Epic's online service for connection.

title: STAR WARS™ Jedi Knight - Jedi Academy™
notes:
Host: Create A Game, Max Players: 16, Advanced, Dedicated Server: No, Pure Server: No, Done, Begin.
Guest: Join A Game, Source: Local, highlight local lobby, Join.

title: Dino D-Day
notes:
Host: Create Server, Launch Game
Guest: Enable Developer Console, hit "~" button under ESC key, type "connect" then HOST_IP.

title: The Ship: Murder Party
notes:
Host: Create Server, Check 'LAN Only', Start
Guest: Join a Cruise, Select the LAN Tab, Refresh all, Select Host Lobby, Connect.

title: Lost Planet™: Extreme Condition
notes: Multiplayer options are blocked once Steam is in Offline Mode.

title: Screencheat
notes: Creating a LAN lobby as host will create a loading loop, game needs to be online to create a LAN lobby

title: Fight The Dragon
notes: Setting up a LAN lobby will not work, game requires the host to be online to create a lobby using their IP address.

title: Borderlands 3
notes: Defaults to LAN mode when offline, but guests cannot find the host lobby in the search browser. No direct IP options.

title: Borderlands 2
notes: Has direct IP commands in launch options, but guests can not join the host lobby, game claims the versions are different and declines access (2.0.0 version on both devices w/wo proton)

title: Classic Marathon Infinity
notes:
Host: Gather Network Game, Check 'Configure UPnP Router', OK, Check Auto-Gather.
Guest: Join Network Game, Check 'Join by address', input host IP in bar below, Join Local Game.

title: Classic Marathon 2
notes:
Host: Gather Network Game, Check 'Configure UPnP Router', OK, Check Auto-Gather.
Guest: Join Network Game, Check 'Join by address', input host IP in bar below, Join Local Game.

title: Classic Marathon
notes:
Host: Gather Network Game, Check 'Configure UPnP Router', OK, Check Auto-Gather.
Guest: Join Network Game, Check 'Join by address', input host IP in bar below, Join Local Game.

title: nail'd
notes:
Host & Guest: Switch to Controller in Gameplay Options Menu.
Host: Multiplayer, LAN, Create, Wait until Lobby is Up
Guest: Multiplayer, LAN, Join, Select Host Lobby.

title: Robot Roller-Derby Disco Dodgeball
notes: Has LAN options, but enabling local network will fail to create lobbies with "InternalReceiveException" error.

title: Little Fighter 2 Remastered
notes:
Playable (Dedicated Server):
Host: Network Play, Start a Private Server, Change port to: 7777, Start.
Guest: Network Play, Join a Private Server, Enter Name, Host IP, and 7777 for port.

title: Risk of Rain 2
notes:
Host: MP, Create MP, Start.
Guest: Press CTRL+ALT+` for D.C menu to appear (use Steam's Edit Controls and make a button for this),
enter: "connect HOST_IP:7777" in the D.C. bar then submit.

title: Command & Conquer™ Remastered Collection
notes: Guest can't find host lobby, and the host can't start the game while in the lobby, LAN mode doesn't work while offline.

title: Unturned
notes:
Playable (Dedicated Server): View Muon Verified Discussions Page to get set up:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/muonverified/discussions/0/591777299172449269/

title: Palworld
notes: Palworld is tightly integrated with Epic Online Services and Steam Networking API; multiplayer features will be inaccessible from the main menu due to an invalid online token.

title: Low Light Combat
notes:
Host: Play, Host, Check 'LAN', Host
Guest: Play, Direct IP, input Host IP.

title: BRINK
notes: Has Direct IP, Dedicated Server, LAN connections and console commands. But once Steam is in offline mode, any option to join or create a game lobby is blocked.

title: Sven Co-op
notes:
Host: Start Game, Go to Game Tab and Check 'LAN Game', Start.
Guest: Join game, Switch to 'LAN' Tab, Refresh, Connect.

title: House Flipper 2
notes:
Host: Co-Op, Host, Switch to LAN, Create.
Guest: Co-Op, Join, Input Host IP.

title: Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced
notes:
(GoTY/Original)
Host: LAN Game, Host Public Game, OK, Wait for Guest Launch.
Guest: Input Host IP in Launch Options on Steam, Launch Game.
(Note: Enhanced version does not work)

title: Cry of Fear
notes:
Host: Host Server, Game Tab, Check "LAN Server", Start
Guest: Press '~' Key Under ESC Key, type 'connect' then type the Host IP in the console, hit enter to join game.

title: Bravery and Greed
notes: Has Direct IP option, but joining lobbies is tied to Steam Networking API, guests can't join via direct IP or server browsing.

title: RUNNING WITH RIFLES
notes: Has Direct IP support, but is tied to online servers. Guests can't join the host lobby.

title: Grim Dawn
notes:
Host: Single Player, Change to Host Multiplayer, Start Game
Guest: Single Player, Change to Join Multiplayer, Host Lobby will Show in Browser, Join.

title: Among Us
notes:
Host: Play, Local, Create Classic or Hide n Seek.
Guest: Play, Local, Host Game will show in the Available Games - Click to join!

title: Move or Die
notes:
Host & Guest: Play Locally, LAN (old school).
Host: Host LAN Game, Wait in Lobby
Guest: Scan Lobby, Screen Will Go Blank, Joined Host Lobby!

title: Satisfactory
notes:
Host: New Game/Continue, MP Settings, Session Type: IP, Start Game.
Guest: Join Game, join game directly, input Host IP. (Note: will be hidden, but does work!)

title: Valheim
notes:
Playable (Dedicated Server):
View Muon Verified Discussions Page to get set up:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/muonverified/discussions/0/506208224013366302/

title: V Rising
notes:
Host: Play, Private Game, Game Settings, Check 'LAN Server, Save, Start Game
Guest: Play, Online Play, Direct Connect Option, Enter Host IP

title: Counter-Strike 2
notes: with 'sv_lan 1' and 'connect' console commands, attempts to join an offline LAN are revoked with Steam requiring online access, dedicated servers need online accessibility to run as well.

title: Divinity: Original Sin - Enhanced Edition
notes:
Host: Continue/New Game, Multiplayer, Wait in Lobby.
Guest: Join, Press Direct IP Button, Input Host IP.

title: Half-Life 2: Deathmatch
notes:
Host: Create Server, Enable Steam Networking, Start
Guest: Join Server, Select LAN Tab, Refresh, Click the lobby, Connect

title: Half-Life
notes:
Host: Create Server, Enable Steam Networking, Start.
Guest: Find Server, Hit 'LAN' Tab, Click Host Server, Connect.

title: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
notes:
Host: Campaign, Host Online Match, Wait in Lobby.
Guest: Campaign, Join Online Match, Press Direct IP Button, Input Host IP.

title: System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Host Game.
Guest: Multiplayer, Join Game, Join IP, Enter Host IP

title: Don't Starve Together
notes:
Host: (Everything will be set to LAN by default) Create lobby, Start Game.
Guest: press "~" under ESC key to bring up the console, type: "c_connect ("HOST_IP", 10999, "HOST_PASSWD")"

title: GTR 2 FIA GT Racing Game
notes:
Related to crash: "UserData\Log\Minidump\GTR2_1.000-20250627.xxx.dmp" when attempting to create profile name and host a lobby.
Game is unplayable but has direct IP support for multiplayer

title: HYPERCHARGE: Unboxed
notes:
Host: Play, LAN, Start Game (LAN)
Guest: Play, LAN, Connect, Input Host IP.
(Note: Once Host Disconnects, lobby can't be recreated, restart game on host to create a new lobby)

title: Magicka
notes: After the host sets up the lobby with LAN enabled, the guest is able to see the lobby, but the guest is blocked by the error message: "authentication failed" when attempting to join

title: FlatOut 2
notes: Guest can't find host lobby in LAN mode. No Direct IP support options as bypass

title: FlatOut
notes: Guest can't find host lobby. No Direct IP support options as bypass

title: Rise of the Triad: Ludicrous Edition
notes:
Host: CBG, LAN Game, Host Game, Start Lobby
Guest: CBG, LAN Game, Join Game By Address, Input Host IP

title: BallisticNG
notes:
Host: MP, Host IP, Enter, Start Lobby
Guest: MP, Join IP, Enter HOST_IP, Join.

title: Dying Light
notes: After completing the prologue on both accounts to set up multiplayer LAN mode, guests can see the host lobby and join, but abruptly disconnect when the game can't connect to Steam Servers.

title: Age of Empires II (Retired)
notes: Entering Multiplayer is blocked by "Steam needs to be online" prompt, direct IP was supported by Gamespy version (Original), replaced with Steam's Networking API for the HD version.

title: Sid Meier’s Civilization® VI
notes: Logged in to sign the in-game EULA, afterwards, when attempting to host a game offline, the lobby would not proceed beyond the game settings menu on LAN mode.

title: Lost Planet® 2
notes:
In System Link mode, errors with: "You need to connect more than one PC with an Ethernet Cable for System Link Play"
no other workaround.

title: Project Zomboid
notes:
Host & Guest: add "-nosteam" to launch option
Host: Host, manage settings, E.S. details, public check & choose pass, start lobby
Guest: Join, put host IP in, enter pass, account U&P, Join

title: Viscera Cleanup Detail
notes:
Host: Create MP Lobby.
Guest: Join Multiplayer Game, Direct IP, Input host IP.

title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
notes:
Playable (Online Login): View Muon Verified Discussions Page to get set up:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/muonverified/discussions/0/664957578230408318/

title: The Forest
notes: Hosting needs to be connected with Steam servers, goes through an endless loop as a result.

title: 7 Days to Die
notes:
After login to establish account connection.
Even with EAC disabled on launch, any option for guests to join a game offline is greyed out once Steam is in Offline Mode.

title: STAR WARS™ Battlefront II (Classic, 2005)
notes: 1.1 forces login to GOG Galaxy when selecting Multiplayer for any servers to be viewable, rolled back to 1.0 for LAN matches, creating multiplayer matches crashes the game.

title: Portal 2
notes:
Host: Open Console with STEAM + X and ' Key,
type "map mp_coop_lobby_3"
Guest:
Open Console, type "connect" then followed by your host IP.

title: Team Fortress 2
notes:
Host: Find a Game, Create Server, Server Type: Local Network (LAN)
Guest:
Enable Console in Options -> Keyboard.
Open Console with ' button.
Type in "connect" then followed by the host IP.

title: Factorio
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Create Lobby.
Disable Verified User Identity in Server Settings, Tags: LAN. Play.
Guest:
Multiplayer, Connect to address
Input host IP address

title: Wreckfest
notes:
LAN scan can't find host lobbies offline, no direct IP option.
Dedicated servers are found on LAN, but block players from joining, no options allowing Steam Authentication to be disabled.

title: Baldur's Gate 3
notes:
Host: Create Multiplayer Game, Edit Session, LAN 'ON' Only.
Guest: STEAM + RT to change UI, will show "Direct Connect" in MP. Click DC and type IP of host,
host can see guest joining.

title: Killing Floor 2
notes: Can't create lobby offline, LAN options are available only when connected to Tripwire servers.

title: BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3: I OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL IN THE FAVELA TRYING TO REVIVE MIT AIA I NEED TO CLOSE IT
notes:
Host: Multiplayer, Start Lobby, Start Game
Guest: Multiplayer, Join Game, Input host IP (Found in Host Plugin) in the "Join game at"

title: Duck Game
notes: Host has to be online before creating a LAN lobby, Game crashes as a result.

title: Worms Armageddon
notes:
Host: Click "Play Over LAN", WORMNET (Config), Player Info: (Your IP) Port: 7777. Exit.
Click LAN Game (Picture), Host.
Guest: Click "Play Over LAN", Put Host IP in Bar Below, Hit "Enter"

title: DOOM + DOOM II
notes:
Host & Guest: Choose Selected Game, Multiplayer, Continue (Don't Add Players), LAN.
Host: Create Match, Start Lobby
Guest: Join Match, Join Lobby.

title: Stardew Valley
notes:
Host: Co-Op, Click "Host" Tab, Start The Mutliplayer Game.
Guest: Co-Op, Click" Join LAN Game, Enter HOST_IP, Click OK.

title: Barony

Host: Play Game, Host LAN Party.
Guest: Play Game, Lobby Browser, Click "LAN" Tab, Join Lobby

Guest: Multiplayer, Join via IP,  Enter HOST_IP, Choose Default IP (7777)

Create Server
Select Game tab and check "LAN Only"
Start Lobby
Guest:

Refresh

notes: Despite direct local IP connection options, users must be online to use any multiplayer functionality.

Check "LAN" and select "Listen" to start lobby.
Guest:
Find Multiplayer
Choose "Lan" tab.

Enable Console in Keyboard & Mouse Settings, press ~ key under ESC button.
Type "map " then any map in the list.
Guest:
Enable Console as well, type "connect" followed by host IP.

notes:
Host: Enable Console in Keyboard & Mouse Settings, open Console, type "map", select any map, Enter.
Guest: A Steam Group Server option will appear on the main menu!

title: Left 4 Dead
notes:
Host: Enable Console in Keyboard & Mouse Settings, open Console, type "map", select any map, Enter.
Guest: A Steam Group Server option will appear on the main menu!

Enable: "Use Steam Networking"
Start Game

Select "Lan" tab
Hit Refresh.

Enable: "Use Steam Networking"
Start Game

Start Game

Guest: Play, Find Sessions, Join Via IP,
Enter HOST_IP.

Choose either "Story" "Terrorist Hunt" or "Verses".
Pick "LAN"

notes:

Choose: "Multiplayer"
Multiplayer Settings:
Servers: Local
Punkbuster: Disabled
Create match.

Select Refresh
When server shows up, Select: FIGHT
